patterns: who is the head of placement cell?
Under whose supervision placement cell is
responses: The Placement Cell is headed by Prof. (Dr.) P.Nanda, supported by a 6 member Training & Placement Council. Each department has a faculty advisor to coordinate between the department and the Training & Placement Cell. There is a student committee represented by the students from each of the departments to coordinate various activities undertaken by the Training & Placement Cell. Student coordinators get ample opportunities for active participation in all the works related to Training & Placement.

patterns: how many courses are there in this college
how many courses are there in this college
responses:
Veer surendra sai university of technology has following courses :

1)  04 YEARS BACHELOR OF TECHNOLOGY (B.TECH) PROGRAMMES (08 Semesters)
2)  05 YEARS BACHELOR OF ARCHITECTURE (B.ARCH) PROGRAMMES (10 Semesters)
3)  05 YEARS B.TECH & M.TECH DUAL DEGREE PROGRAMMES (10 Semesters)
4) 02 YEARS MASTER OF TECHNOLOGY (M.TECH) PROGRAMMES (04 Semesters)
5) 02 YEARS MASTER IN COMPUTER APPLICATIONS (MCA) PROGRAMME (04 Semesters)
6) 02 YEARS MASTER OF SCIENCE (M.Sc.) PROGRAMMES (04 Semesters)
7) 05 YEARS INTEGRATED MASTER OF SCIENCE (M.Sc.) PROGRAMMES (10 Semesters)
8) 01 YEAR MASTER IN PHILOSOPHY (M.PHIL) PROGRAMMES (02 Semesters)
9) PhD PROGRAMMES

patterns: what are the student requirements for admission
what are the student requirements for admission
what do I need to get admitted
responses:
1) FOR 04 YEARS B.TECH / 05 YEARS B.TECH & M.TECH DUAL DEGREE (CIVIL ENGG. & ELECTRICAL ENGG.) / B.TECH (LATERAL ENTRY) / MCA & MCA (LATERAL ENTRY) AND 5YRS ARCHITECTURE WILL BE DONE THROUGH OJEE / JEE (Main)
 2)02 YEARS M.TECH:- Valid GATE Score is required for admission into 02 years M.Tech Programme. However, vacant seats in M.Tech specializations are filled up by Non-GATE candidate based on career assessment.
3)FOR 02 YEARS M.Sc.:- Career Assessment is the criteria for admission into 02 years M.Sc. Programme in July every year.
4)05 YEARS INTEGRATED M.Sc.:- Entrance Exam Conducted by VSSUT / OJEE / OJEE(Main) in July every year.
5)01 YEARS M.PHIL:- Entrance Exam Conduct by VSSUT in July every year.
6)Ph.D.:- Entrance Exam Conduct by VSSUT followed by interview (in July &January every year)

patterns: what is the teaching style of this college?
Is the teaching pattern different from other college?
responses: Stringent selection procedure, in-depth & high intensity of teaching are not the only hallmarks of VSSUT. On top of all these, students are taken through industrial tours and are familiarized through industrial safety gadgets & procedures. They get an opportunity to hear from the industry stalwarts, CEOs, entrepreneurs, economists, and planners in the campus. They are en¬couraged to innovate and file patents. They are encouraged and guided to win National Level competitions on robotics, automotive designs, sports, and quiz. Students are also trained in Soft Skills to work seamlessly in a multicultural environment.

For BTech.
There are assignments and written exams. The assignments have deadlines which you should not exceed if you want to get better marks,and exams are of 2 types midsem and endsem the mid sem consists of 30 marks and endsem consists of 50 marks and 20 marks are for assignment.

VSSUT is a State University recognized under Section 12(B) of UGC. With a state of the art infrastructure, well-equipped laboratory facilities, best-in-class faculty, a long-drawn track record of high quality research and development and focus on cutting-edge technology, VSSUT produces 1300+ industry-ready graduates besides a host of research scholars. True to its reputation, VSSUT imparts high quality education to about 5200 students in B. Tech (13 disciplines), M. Tech (21 disciplines), M. Sc (9 disciplines), M. Phil, MCA and PhD in a 350-acre fully residential campus. With one-third of students as women, it has one of the best gender diversity ratio.

First in the state and second in Eastern India (after IIT, Kharagpur), University College of Engineering(UCE) which started with 40 students six decades back has come a long way. Today it is a State University, called Veer Surendra Sai University of Technology (VSSUT) operating in a 350 acresprawling campus, imparting world class education to over 5000 students in multiple under graduate and post graduate courses including PhD.

Imparting the best quality Engineering education thereby creating top-brass Nation- builders has been the solitary motive of VSSUT ever since it came into existence. Unflinching academic rigor and strict adherence towards ethics are core values of VSSUT. Tough evaluation standards, strict deadlines of submissions of reports, frequent examinations are few highlights of the uncompromising levels of academic standards. This makes the students gradually elevate from learners to astute professionals capable of handling industry / corporate pressure and still deliver high performance. The competitive environments offered by VSSUT makes the students ready to face the ever- changing and highly challenging actual job arena. We also have the best gamut of faculty who not only serve VSSUT but also deliver in other reputed institutions all across the region and are on panels of IITs and NITs.
Our college premises will be open from 7:00 am to 5:00 pm only.

patterns: will there be any extra curriculum activities?
does the college conducts any fun program
responses:
Yes, Of course. Our college not only provides excellent education but also encourage students to take part in different curriculum activities. The college conducts yearly programs like Sports meet, Carnival, Holi festival, and Christmas. 
 Also our college has basketball court, badminton court, table tennis, chess, carrom board and many more refreshment zones.

patterns: what facilities are provided by the college?
what are the facilities of college for students
responses: With excellent education facilities, Our College provides various other facilities like 24 hours internet,1200 capacity Auditorium,300 capacity Biju Pattnaik E-learning Centre, library, discusson room, canteen, parking space,Research Facility,Workshop,guest house and student service for any students queries.
